law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 79, effective July 1, 1983. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 294, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 1. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 17. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 241, sec. 1. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 359a-1, 359a-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Expense accounts of state officers and employees.
